title: Fried green beans with miso sauce

insSteps: Place a large pan over medium heat and add the sesame seeds. Toast for about 3 minutes, mixing often, until golden brown. Transfer to a mortar and pestle. Add the sugar and a pinch of salt, and pound into a coarse crumb. Set aside.

Place the same pan over high heat. When hot, add 1 tablespoon of oil and the beans. Fry for about 4 minutes, colouring the beans on all sides, turn off the heat. Add  ½ teaspoon salt and toss to combine. Add the marinade, the coriander, and mix well.
For the marinade, mix all ingredients to taste.
To serve, pile the beans onto a plate and sprinkle over the sesame seed mix.
